entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle near noon. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
